text: The 1972 Czechoslovak Figure Skating Championships was held on December 18–19, 1971 in Karvina. Medals were awarded in the disciplines of men's singles, ladies' singles, pair skating, and ice dancing. ==Results== ===Men=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Rank ! Rank !
